name: TheResolutionHelper
0:
”Alexa, launch the Resolution Helper”
”Tell the Resolution Helper to give me a resolution.”
”Tell the Resolution Helper that I give up.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: resolution helper
des: Need a New Year’s resolution but just don’t have time to think of one? Or how about a ready-made excuse for not following through? Fret no more, friend! Just sit back, relax, maybe pop some bottom-shelf bubbly, and let Brownstein Group’s Resolution Helper take the guilt and hassle out of making—and breaking—your New Year’s resolutions.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
